meanings.definition: A person who scores points in a game or competition.
meanings.sent1: The soccer team's top scorer was one of the best scorers in the league.
meanings.sent2: The basketball game ended with the scorers celebrating their victory.
meanings.sent3: The young scorers at the spelling bee were eager to show off their skills.
meanings.sent4: In the race, the fastest runner emerged as the ultimate scorer of the day.
meanings.sent5: The video game competition had skilled scorers battling for the top spot.
